thread.title: Fire restrictions may soon hit Campbell County if dry weather remains
thread.title_full: Fire restrictions may soon hit Campbell County if dry weather remains

author: JONATHAN GALLARDO News Record Writer jgallardo@gillettenewsrecord.net
title: Fire restrictions may soon hit Campbell County if dry weather remains
text: March is typically one of the wettest and snowiest months in Gillette, but the Campbell County Fire Department is keeping a very close eye on the conditions and has been having conversations on possible burn restrictions in the near future. [] featured Fire restrictions may soon hit Campbell County if dry weather remains [Jonathan Gallardo](https://www.gillettenewsrecord.com/users/profile/jgallardo) Get email notifications on {{subject}} daily!
